hero.headline: Where Marketing Vision Meets Technical Reality
hero.body: Great marketing ideas often break at the handoff... I thrive on turning abstract goals into powerful, revenue-focused marketing engines.

highlights: 70% support ticket reduction via AI + automation
86% cache hit rate with edge caching

bullets: Built 400+ automations; unified LMS, Woo, CRM, analytics.
E-commerce conversion lift with UX + checkout improvements.
Stabilized ops; improved GTM + CRM; faster campaign cadence.
Rebrand + technical SEO → ~35% increase in qualified inquiries.
~45% growth in patient visits; online check-in integration.

results: 45% avg patient-visit growth over three years
